Write the results to the project directory

write_results.Rd

Write the results to the project directory

write_results(
  data,
  path_to_results = NULL,
  investorname = NULL,
  asset_type = NULL,
  level = NULL,
  file_type = NULL
)

Arguments

data

A dataframe the results of the stress test for one asset type
path_to_results

Character. A string that contains the path that the result should be written to.
investorname

Character. A string containing the name of the investor for which the analysis was run. Is used as part of the file name.
asset_type

Character. A vector of length one indicating which type of asset the results belong to. Currently supports "equity" and "bonds".
level

Character. A vector of length one indicating which type of output format to use. This depends on whether portfolio or company level pacta data were used as input to the analysis. Defaults to the level indicated in the work flow. Supports "company" and "portfolio".
file_type

Character. A string containing the type of file that should be written to the result path. Currently supports "csv" and "rda".

See also

Other output functions: write_results_new()
